as_tbl_data

Source: R/tbl.R
as_tbl_data.Rd

Converts data objects to tibbles.

as_tbl_data(x, row_names = FALSE)

Arguments

x

Data frame or data frame-like input.
row_names

Logical indicating whether to convert non-null row names into the first column.

Examples

## data with row names
d <- data.frame(x = rnorm(5), y = rnorm(5), row.names = letters[1:5])

## convert to tibble
as_tbl_data(d)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 2
#>          x      y
#>      <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1 -1.40     1.15 
#> 2  0.255   -1.82 
#> 3 -2.44    -0.247
#> 4 -0.00557 -0.244
#> 5  0.622   -0.283

## convert to tibble and create row_names variable
as_tbl_data(d, row_names = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#>   row_names        x      y
#>   <chr>        <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1 a         -1.40     1.15 
#> 2 b          0.255   -1.82 
#> 3 c         -2.44    -0.247
#> 4 d         -0.00557 -0.244
#> 5 e          0.622   -0.283
